A dynamic and skilled professional offering over 5+ years of experience in Mechanical/Industrial Engineering

also estimating budget and scope of project.
Demonstrated abilities at efficiently analyzing problems to see how mechanical and thermal devices might help
solve the problem.
Possesses sound knowledge regarding Power plants and highly recognized for managing and working with
complex competitive projects and delivering them successfully on time.
Prepare reports and documents and evaluate theoretical designs.
A strong team player with excellent analytical, problem solving and interpersonal skills.
